meanings.definition: To give attention with the ear; attend closely for the purpose of hearing.
meanings.sent1: I listen to the birds chirping in the morning.
meanings.sent2: Please listen carefully to the instructions.
meanings.sent3: I tried to listen to the music with my eyes closed.
meanings.sent4: Her heart could listen to the unspoken words.
meanings.sent5: Listen to the wind rustling through the leaves.

meanings.sent1: You should listen to your parents' advice.
meanings.sent2: Listen to the teacher if you want to learn.
meanings.sent3: I always listen to my stomach when it's hungry.
meanings.sent4: Listen to your inner voice guiding you.
meanings.sent5: Listen to the warning signs before it's too late.

meanings.definition: To wait attentively for a sound.
meanings.sent1: We listen for the sound of the doorbell when expecting guests.
meanings.sent2: Listen for the phone to ring; it might be important.
meanings.sent3: I listen for the popcorn to finish popping in the microwave.
meanings.sent4: Listen for the distant thunder signaling a storm.
meanings.sent5: Listen for the first notes of the music to start dancing.
